Make your paycheck work harder with Space Wallet

Own the unlimited power of the online payment.

Download on the App Store
Android application
Coming soon...

With over 25 million active customers,
we’re on a mission

A mission to focus on the three things most important to us.

Set goals and save automatically

Automatically tuck a little money away every time you get paid and earn 0.24% APY¹ with no hidden fees.

  • Create up to five savings goals
  • Change your contribution anytime
  • Transfer to your spending account instantly

Use your card to spend confidently

Get a shiny new debit card when you set up a spending account in Space Wallet. Plus, earn 6X more interest³ than the national average.

  • No hidden fees
  • Free withdrawals at 32,000 ATMs nationwide

And when the unexpected happens, get cash instantly

Emergencies shouldn’t put you into debt. Use Space Cashout to access money in a pinch — it'll be repaid from your next paycheck automatically.

Funds are available instantly with your Space debit card.

Learn more about Cashout

The wallet the world trusts

Tap into a global network of millions who already know and trust Space.

3.7 billion orders

Automatic optimizations powered by

$225 billion in sales

Battle-hardened by over

500 million

customers who used Space Wallet

Empowering independent business owners everywhere
Try for free
Paychecks

Quickly view your paychecks and a simple breakdown of your hours, taxes and more.

Transaction records

Get a clear record of your debit card activity, so you can track your transactions.

Paycheck splitter

Use the paycheck splitter to automatically route your paycheck into different accounts.

No hidden fees

We eliminated fees and built tools to help you pay less interest.

Track your money at a glance

With Space, settling up feels like catching up. Send and receive money with Space friends and express yourself in each payment note.

Split the necessities

Utilities, rent, groceries — when you’re splitting basic bills, everyone pays up easily.

Learn more
Accept Space at your business

Use Space for those generous moments: send cash for coffee, celebrate a birthday, or just say hi.

Learn more
Split the fun

Settle up with Space friends for any shared activity, from road trips to picnics to takeout.
